t:
how my dad used to read bedtime stories every night and check under the
bed for monsters before I'd sleep.

I can still hear him reading but it
gives me a chill everytime I think
back to that fateful night when he forgot to check.
c:
I can only hear him reading, not see.

Meant to be open to interpretations.


What do you remember when you #sitonthebed  #YourQuoteAndMine
Collaborating with YourQuote Baba



#bedtimestories #stories #dad #monstersunderthebed #monster #ghost
